BCrypt
BCrypt implements OpenBSD-style Blowfish password hashing using the scheme described in "A Future-Adaptable Password Scheme" by Niels Provos and David Mazieres.

Customer
Customer domain class extends the User class for common attributes and methods
CustomerController
This controller manages all the buttons selected in CustomerView EventHandler logoutButton : if you click on the logout button you go back to the LoginView EventHandler profileButton: if the profile button is clicked you go back to the CustomerView EventHandler searchButton: if the search button is clicked you go to the ResearchView where you can buy search for new Events EventHandler openTicket: if you click on one row of the ticketTableView you go to the TicketPageView where you can see the information about the ticket you bought

UpperBar
 
User
Abstract class that represents a generic Event.
WrapArtist
This wrap class represents the result of a statistic and contains 2 arrayLists: one for the numerical results (Double) and one for the corresponding artists (String).
WrapGenre
This wrap class represents the result of a statistic and contains 2 arrayLists: one for the numerical results (Double) and one for the corresponding genres (Genre).
WrapProv
This wrap class represents the result of a statistic and contains 2 arrayLists: one for the numerical results (Double) and one for the corresponding provinces (Province).
WrapType
This wrap class represents the result of a statistic and contains 2 arrays: one for the numerical results (double) and one for the corresponding types (Type).
